About.paragraph: Solving the world’s problems through technology wouldn’t be possible without our most important invention: the STRATEGYZer. Have a look at our innovative solutions.
About.paragraph2: We are a Pre-Seed Recruitment Accelerator Startup Vendor that specializes in diversity talent across the india with results in the technology, manufacturing & corporate landscape.

Why.text: Strong half a million+ CV database

Why2.text: Candidate experience Regular interaction and monitoring

Testimonials.text: Strategyz empowers individuals, fostering a sense of ownership and accountability.
Testimonials.name: Sarthak Joshi

Testimonials.text: Strategyz empowers individuals, serving as the nexus where innovative ideas converge, strategies evolve, and success unfolds organically.
Testimonials.name: Devashish Jindal

Testimonials.text: Strategyz Inc. fosters a dynamic environment where I continuously learn and grow as a strategyzer.
Testimonials.name: Balraj Dhakar

Testimonials.text: Working with flexible hours has empowered me to optimize productivity, maintain work-life balance, and deliver exceptional results with unparalleled autonomy and satisfaction.
Testimonials.name: Atharva Jaurkar

Testimonials.text: At Strategyz, The energizing work environment and supportive team make every day fulfilling and inspiring.
Testimonials.name: Garvit Jain

Testimonials.text: At Strategyz, I'm proud to be part of a vibrant startup where our incredible work culture fuels creativity and teamwork every day.
Testimonials.name: Ambuj Srivasatava

Contact.address2: Abiroo Strategyz Technologies Private Limited, Bengaluru, Karnataka, India - 560076

Features.title: Quality
Features.text: We use 15+ sourcing channels to source quality resumes.

Features.title: Speed
Features.text: You can expect the first batch of resumes within 3 - 4 days.

Features.title: Time Saving
Features.text: All resumes received will be pre-screened to save your screening time.

Features.title: Assurance
Features.text: Model is completely postpaid, with 30 days refund/replacement clause to safeguard your interests.

vacancies.title: Full Stack Developer
vacancies.description: We are looking for a Full Stack Developer with experience in React and Node.js. Responsibilities include developing front-end website architecture, designing user interactions, and ensuring responsiveness of applications.

vacancies.title: Backend Developer
vacancies.description: Join our team as a Backend Developer with expertise in Java and Spring Boot. You will be responsible for server-side web application logic and integration of the work front-end developers do.

vacancies.title: Sales Executive
vacancies.description: We are seeking a motivated Sales Executive to join our growing team. Your role will involve identifying new sales opportunities, building client relationships, and achieving sales targets.

vacancies.title: Account Manager
vacancies.description: As an Account Manager, you will manage client accounts, ensure client satisfaction, and help to grow our business by maintaining and developing client relationships.

vacancies.title: Marketing Coordinator
vacancies.description: We are looking for a Marketing Coordinator to assist with planning and executing marketing campaigns. You will work closely with the marketing team to develop content, coordinate events, and track campaign performance.

vacancies.title: Digital Marketing Specialist
vacancies.description: Join our team as a Digital Marketing Specialist. You will be responsible for managing our online presence, executing SEO strategies, and running PPC campaigns to increase our brand awareness and drive traffic.

vacancies.title: Customer Support Representative
vacancies.description: We are hiring a Customer Support Representative to provide excellent service to our clients. Responsibilities include resolving customer issues, providing product information, and maintaining customer satisfaction.

vacancies.title: Technical Support Specialist
vacancies.description: As a Technical Support Specialist, you will assist customers with technical problems, guide them through solutions, and ensure technical issues are resolved promptly and effectively.

vacancies.title: Business Development Manager
vacancies.description: We are looking for a Business Development Manager to identify new business opportunities, build relationships with potential clients, and develop strategic partnerships to drive business growth.

vacancies.title: Business Analyst
vacancies.description: Join our team as a Business Analyst. You will analyze market trends, identify business opportunities, and provide insights to help shape our business strategy.

vacancies.title: HR Manager
vacancies.description: We are seeking an HR Manager to oversee all aspects of human resources practices and processes. You will support business needs and ensure the proper implementation of company HR strategies.

vacancies.title: Recruitment Specialist
vacancies.description: Join our team as a Recruitment Specialist. You will manage the recruitment process, including sourcing candidates, conducting interviews, and coordinating hiring processes to find the best talent.
